alternative. The CX initially refused, but later agreed to the alternative.

the correct answer.its comes under agent error strict feedback will be
shared.

Kindly refer call recording



Regards,
Pranjal Parab

notes.body:
Hi Team,

Our operational time is till 11pm where we make calls to the customer till
11pm. Here in this case order was assigned to the agent at 10:57PM and at
the same time a call was made to the customer for substitution, Customer
didn't show proper response on call and disconnected the call stating he is
sleeping, Agent took action on order at the same time at 11:59PM.

Call recording is attached for your reference.

*Warm Regards, *

*Shakeel Shaikh*

*Subject Matter Expert – Centralized Calling Team*

*http://www.pharmeasy.in  <http://www.pharmeasy.in/ >*

Hi Team,

Our operational time is till 11pm where we make calls to the customer till 11pm. Here in this case order was assigned to the agent at 10:57PM and at the same time a call was made to the customer for substitution, Customer didn't show proper response on call and disconnected the call stating he is sleeping, Agent took action on order at the same time at 11:59PM.

Call recording is attached for your reference.

Warm Regards, 
Shakeel Shaikh

notes.body: Hello Vikram,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #654853723132526592-27807, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered, CARDACE METO 2.5MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS quantities of 2. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.     I am highlighting your concern to the Escalation team, and our team will investigate it. If the medicine is found to be missing, the refund amount of Rs. 385.82 will be initiated. Post initiation of refund, the amount will get credited to your payment source within 5 to 7 working days.     You can expect the resolution within 24 to 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it.      Further, was the parcel intact, or was there any damage from the outside at the time of delivery?     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Vikram,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #654853723132526592-27807, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered, CARDACE METO 2.5MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS quantities of 2. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.

I am highlighting your concern to the Escalation team, and our team will investigate it. If the medicine is found to be missing, the refund amount of Rs. 385.82 will be initiated. Post initiation of refund, the amount will get credited to your payment source within 5 to 7 working days.

You can expect the resolution within 24 to 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it. 

Further, was the parcel intact, or was there any damage from the outside at the time of delivery?

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Priyal,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern with regard to the order Id #655100157791805440-11634. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried multiple times to reach out to you for the consultation. However, they were unable to connect with you.     I request you to place a new order with an active number, or you may upload a valid prescription to avoid doctor consultation. I am sorry to inform you that the order could not be processed further without the teleconsultation.     You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.  https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599  ​  Kindly confirm whether the registered number or the delivery contact number is active so that we can arrange a doctor’s call on one of them.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Priyal,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I understand your concern with regard to the order Id #655100157791805440-11634. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per the records, the order was assigned for a doctor consultation. Our partnered doctors tried multiple times to reach out to you for the consultation. However, they were unable to connect with you.

I request you to place a new order with an active number, or you may upload a valid prescription to avoid doctor consultation. I am sorry to inform you that the order could not be processed further without the teleconsultation.

notes.body: Hello Vivek,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #654713375030771712.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered on 02nd December 2025. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 05 December 2025.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy

Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

notes.body: Hello Abbas,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      With regards to your order #654180063699804160-54946, I can see the requested medicine STON 1B6 DELICIOUS PINEAPPLE FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 250 ML ORAL SOLUTION was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was removed from your order to ensure that the rest of the medicines are delivered to you.     I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the partner retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine. I am sorry for the unpleasant experience that you had with our platform. It was never our intention to upset you by any means.     Also, I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the partner retailer.     As per our records, your refund of Rs. 235.85 was initiated on 02nd December 2025. You will receive the refund to your payment source within 5 to 7 business days. Please note that Saturdays, Sundays, and bank holidays are not considered business days.     You can track your refund via the RRN number: 1764696304776c16f8c7.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.       Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Abbas,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

With regards to your order #654180063699804160-54946, I can see the requested medicine STON 1B6 DELICIOUS PINEAPPLE FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 250 ML ORAL SOLUTION was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was removed from your order to ensure that the rest of the medicines are delivered to you.

I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the partner retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine. I am sorry for the unpleasant experience that you had with our platform. It was never our intention to upset you by any means.

Also, I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the partner retailer.

As per our records, your refund of Rs. 235.85 was initiated on 02nd December 2025. You will receive the refund to your payment source within 5 to 7 business days. Please note that Saturdays, Sundays, and bank holidays are not considered business days.

You can track your refund via the RRN number: 1764696304776c16f8c7.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

 Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Bhavesh Nahata,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We are trying to contact you regarding your Dr consultation but the call not get connected      For the Free Doctor Consultation offer after completing your order. We are happy to guide you on how to avail this benefit:  Visit the “My Orders” section in your account.  Locate the relevant order and click on the Free Doctor Consultation option.  A coupen code will be displayed on the screen.  Use Coupen code to proceed further and select your preferred doctor, along with the date and time for the consultation.  Once you have selected the date and time, click on “Place Order”. Your consultation will then be scheduled without any payment. Hello Khush Jain,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #655134346228707328-16922, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 04th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Sandhya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​​   I understand your concern with regard to the discount. I will surely assist you with this.     The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.     Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.     With regard to your PharmEasy Plus membership, you receive credit cashback for every eligible order. To know more about PharmEasy Plus membership, kindly click on the following link: https://PharmEasy.in/help/PharmEasy-plus-43000566797.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Sandhya,

​​
I understand your concern with regard to the discount. I will surely assist you with this.

The discount displayed in the search results is part of our “Best Pricing” feature. To avail this offer, you need to apply the appropriate coupon code, which is shown at the top of the cart page during checkout.

Please note that PharmEasy provides up to 10% product-level discount to all our customers. Further additional discounts can be availed based on the applicable coupon codes or vouchers available at the time of placing the order.

With regard to your PharmEasy Plus membership, you receive credit cashback for every eligible order. To know more about PharmEasy Plus membership, kindly click on the following link: https://PharmEasy.in/help/PharmEasy-plus-43000566797.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

Hello Pradip,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #651250724455768064-69250, as checked the return request is already raised for medicine from your order. As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 05 December 2025.

As the medicine has been  returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days. 

We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Akanksha,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #655118103246012416-68674.We tried to call you regarding the concern raised however we are unable to establish contact with you.    We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     Since you are a valued customer, as a token of apology, we have credited Rs.30/- to your PharmEasy wallet on 12 April 2025.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,

​I am writing to express my severe disappointment and frustration regarding
a significantly delayed order, which has received no proper communication
or update.

​*Order Details:*

   - ​*Order ID:* 654505426311692288
   - ​*Date Placed:* 1 December 2025
   - ​*Current Date:* 4 December 2025

​The order, placed three days ago, has not yet been delivered, nor have I
received any proactive communication or reliable updates on its status or
revised delivery timeline.

​Furthermore, I am a paid subscriber of the *PharmEasy Plus Membership*,
which guarantees benefits like priority processing and quicker delivery.
The current service experience falls drastically short of the promised
standards for a premium customer. The complete lack of accessible customer
support or communication channels to resolve this delay is unacceptable,
especially since *this order contains essential medication for my
82-year-old grandparent, making the delay a critical health concern.*

​I demand an *immediate and accurate update* on the location and estimated
delivery time of my order. I also request a clear explanation for this
service lapse.

​Please treat this as an extremely urgent matter and take steps to expedite
the delivery or provide a concrete resolution immediately.

​Thank you for your prompt attention to this issue.

​Sincerely,

​Omkar C Katkar

My Contact Number: 7715066912

My Email Address: omkarkatkar1999@gmail.com


Attachment

1) screenshot of my order ID

-- 


Disclaimer:

This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, 
and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is 
intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If 
you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any 
disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of 
this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to

notes.body: Hello Manish,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #655101397116362752-32245, I see a return request has already been raised for the wrong ZANDU KESARI JIVAN NUTRITION BOTTLE OF 900 G on 04th December 2025. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.   Please be informed, items that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.          The medicines will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund amount of Rs. 645.82 will be processed and initiated within 48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source in 5 to 7 business days.    I appreciate your patience in the meantime.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Manish,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

With regards to your order #655101397116362752-32245, I see a return request has already been raised for the wrong ZANDU KESARI JIVAN NUTRITION BOTTLE OF 900 G on 04th December 2025. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

Please be informed, items that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.

The medicines will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund amount of Rs. 645.82 will be processed and initiated within 48 hours. Also, once the refund is initiated, it will reflect in your payment source in 5 to 7 business days.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Rahul,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  Thank you for reaching out to us.  We understand your concern regarding doctor verification calls while placing an order from London. In this case, we would like to inform you that you can proceed by placing the order with a valid doctor’s prescription. When a valid prescription is uploaded during the order placement, a verification call from the doctor is not required.  Kindly ensure that the prescription is clear, includes the doctor’s details, and is dated.     To know more about the valid prescription, please visit the link mentioned below. https://pharmeasy.in/help/general-enquiries-43000348790/what-is-a-valid-prescription--43000187796     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.       Regards,  Devdas.

notes.body: Hello Ishwarya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities.      Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba

notes.body: Hello Ashish,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      With regards to your order #652700553610186752-59197, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine VELTAM PLUS STRIP OF 15 TABLETS of 1 quantity. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.   I am highlighting your concern and our team will investigate. If the medicine is found to be missing, a refund will be initiated. After initiation of a refund, the amount will be credited to your payment source within 5-7 working days.     Also, please confirm the parcel was intact at the time of delivery or that any damage was there.     You can expect the resolution within 24 - 48 hours. We will get back to you with an update once we receive it. I request your patience in the meantime.   Regards,  Neeha

Hello Ashish,

With regards to your order #652700553610186752-59197, I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine VELTAM PLUS STRIP OF 15 TABLETS of 1 quantity. notes.body: Hello Sivabalan,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #654048258098200576-79555.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Sivabalan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #654048258098200576-79555.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered delivered to you. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Purushottam,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concerns regarding the cancellation of your PharmEasy Plus membership. I will surely assist you with this.     Please share the reason for your desire to cancel the Plus membership, and if you decide to proceed with the cancellation, the refund will be calculated based on the date of your purchase.     The refunded amount will be credited to your PharmEasy Wallet as Refund Cash. Please note that the refunded amount does not have an expiry date, and you can use the full amount in a single transaction at your convenience.     We kindly request your confirmation on whether you would like to proceed with the cancellation of your PharmEasy Plus membership so we can take further action.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body_html:
Hello Damodar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

helpdesk_ticket.description:
[Vetnova Logo](https://www.vetnova.co.in/)

Sodium Butyrate Coated: The Sustained-Release Solution for Gut Health & Performance

Dear Abhu,

What if you could lock in better digestion, stronger immunity, and optimal nutrient absorption with a single additive?

Sodium butyrate is the additive of choice, which is effective for intestinal integrity, energy production for gut cells and bacterial balance and immune stimulation. However, standard forms are often absorbed too early. Coating technology changes the game—delivering the active ingredient exactly where it is needed most.

- ➤ Vetnova introduces Sodium Butyrate Coated (30% & 90%), a premium feed additive featuring advanced coating technology that ensures sustained release, maximum efficacy, and targeted delivery to the lower gastrointestinal tract.

Why Sodium Butyrate Coated Matters

Controlled Release Technology

- The specialized coating prevents early breakdown in the stomach, ensuring a slow and sustained release of butyrate deep into the intestines for long-lasting effect.

Optimized Gut Flora

- Selectively promotes the growth of beneficial bacteria while suppressing pathogens, creating a balanced and resilient microbiome essential for animal health.

Enhanced Nutrient Absorption

- Strengthens the gut lining and increases villi height, improving the animal's ability to absorb nutrients, resulting in better Feed Conversion Rates (FCR) and growth.

What Makes It Stand Out

Key Benefits

- Repairs and maintains the integrity of the gastrointestinal lining.
- Significantly boosts immunity, reducing the risk of infections and diseases.
- Effective during critical periods of stress, such as weaning or dietary transitions.
- Improves overall growth performance and profitability in Poultry, Livestock, and Aquaculture.
- High stability with a 3-year shelf life.
- Safe, non-toxic, and manufactured under strict WHO GMP & ISO Certified standards.

Product Highlights

A versatile, high-stability additive available in 30% and 90% concentrations, designed to provide targeted gut health support and immune enhancement.

Manufactured by Vetnova, a WHO-GMP & ISO certified company committed to quality-driven animal nutrition and safety.

Ready to Connect?

Contact our consultant today for a Sodium Butyrate Coated quotation!

[Contact our consultant today!](https://www.vetnova.co.in/contact/)

[Call: (+91) 86977 14093](tel:+918697714093)

[Website](https://www.vetnova.co.in) [Blog](https://www.vetnova.co.in/blogs/) [LinkedIn](https://in.linkedin.com/company/vetnova-feed)

© 2025 Vetnova (Animal Health & Feed Additives Division of WBCIL). All rights reserved.

Why Sodium Butyrate Coated Matters

Controlled Release Technology

  • The specialized coating prevents early breakdown in the stomach, ensuring a slow and sustained release of butyrate deep into the intestines for long-lasting effect.

Optimized Gut Flora

  • Selectively promotes the growth of beneficial bacteria while suppressing pathogens, creating a balanced and resilient microbiome essential for animal health.

Enhanced Nutrient Absorption

  • Strengthens the gut lining and increases villi height, improving the animal's ability to absorb nutrients, resulting in better Feed Conversion Rates (FCR) and growth.

What Makes It Stand Out

Key Benefits

  • Repairs and maintains the integrity of the gastrointestinal lining.
  • Significantly boosts immunity, reducing the risk of infections and diseases.
  • Effective during critical periods of stress, such as weaning or dietary transitions.
  • Improves overall growth performance and profitability in Poultry, Livestock, and Aquaculture.
  • High stability with a 3-year shelf life.
  • Safe, non-toxic, and manufactured under strict WHO GMP & ISO Certified standards.

Product Highlights

A versatile, high-stability additive available in 30% and 90% concentrations, designed to provide targeted gut health support and immune enhancement.
Manufactured by Vetnova, a WHO-GMP & ISO certified company committed to quality-driven animal nutrition and safety.

Ready to Connect?

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern regarding the mail.     I would like to inform you that we only export in pan India.    You may place a new order from the PharmEasy application or website- www.pharmeasy.in or you may call us at  999 29 999 29 and Press 1 to place an order. If the medicine is available, it will be delivered to you. Please note that the orders can only be placed from an Indian-registered mobile number.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I understand your concern regarding the mail.

I would like to inform you that we only export in pan India.

You may place a new order from the PharmEasy application or website- www.pharmeasy.in or you may call us at  999 29 999 29 and Press 1 to place an order. If the medicine is available, it will be delivered to you. Please note that the orders can only be placed from an Indian-registered mobile number.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

helpdesk_ticket.description: This is to bring you into notice that I ordered gardasil vaccine which was delivered on 21st November 2025 for my hpv vaccination which was done on 22nd November 2025. The pharmeasy team sent a nurse for the administration of the same. It was clearly written on the injection thay it should be administered intramuscular only. But the nurse insisted and gave the vaccine subcutaneously on the tummy portion near the belly . When I contacted the nurse who was from venus superspeciality hospital , vadodara , for complaining for the same issue , she told that this is only the way we administer this vaccine to every patient please don't worry and for further any questions ask your gynaecologist.But this technique of administration is totally wrong. It was Clearly written on the injection as well as the pn pharmeasy app  that it should be given only intramuscular. And now when asked my doctor she told this dose won't be effective as it was given subcutaneously, it has to be given intramuscular for its effectiveness and she advised me to repeat the dose.  As this vaccines are very costly , not everyone can afford it. Someone's mistake can ruin someone's else's life.  Now what should I do?  Either deliver me the same vaccine without any money otherwise refund the  total amount to my original payment method at any circumstances, anyhow.     Thankyou

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22248504  
      Subject:   
      Description:  This is to bring you into notice that I ordered gardasil vaccine which was delivered on 21st November 2025 for my hpv vaccination which was done on 22nd November 2025. The pharmeasy team sent a nurse for the administration of the same. It was clearly written on the injection thay it should be administered intramuscular only. But the nurse insisted and gave the vaccine subcutaneously on the tummy portion near the belly . When I contacted the nurse who was from venus superspeciality hospital , vadodara , for complaining for the same issue , she told that this is only the way we administer this vaccine to every patient please don't worry and for further any questions ask your gynaecologist.But this technique of administration is totally wrong. It was Clearly written on the injection as well as the pn pharmeasy app  that it should be given only intramuscular. And now when asked my doctor she told this dose won't be effective as it was given subcutaneously, it has to be given intramuscular for its effectiveness and she advised me to repeat the dose. As this vaccines are very costly , not everyone can afford it. Someone's mistake can ruin someone's else's life.  Now what should I do? 
 Either deliver me the same vaccine without any money otherwise refund the  total amount to my original payment method at any circumstances, anyhow. 
   
 Thankyou

Subject:

Description:
This is to bring you into notice that I ordered gardasil vaccine which was delivered on 21st November 2025 for my hpv vaccination which was done on 22nd November 2025. The pharmeasy team sent a nurse for the administration of the same. It was clearly written on the injection thay it should be administered intramuscular only. But the nurse insisted and gave the vaccine subcutaneously on the tummy portion near the belly . When I contacted the nurse who was from venus superspeciality hospital , vadodara , for complaining for the same issue , she told that this is only the way we administer this vaccine to every patient please don't worry and for further any questions ask your gynaecologist.But this technique of administration is totally wrong. It was Clearly written on the injection as well as the pn pharmeasy app  that it should be given only intramuscular. And now when asked my doctor she told this dose won't be effective as it was given subcutaneously, it has to be given intramuscular for its effectiveness and she advised me to repeat the dose.
As this vaccines are very costly , not everyone can afford it. Someone's mistake can ruin someone's else's life.
Now what should I do?
Either deliver me the same vaccine without any money otherwise refund the  total amount to my original payment method at any circumstances, anyhow.

Thankyou

notes.body: Hello,      Greetings from PharmEasy!       I am sorry to know that you are unable to operate the PharmEasy application. We aim to provide the best service, however, situations like these are rare.      Please be informed that at times, due to network issues, you may face such technical issues. As a quick fix, I request you to clear your browsing cookies, cache and reinstall your PharmEasy application and connect to a stable network. If you face any difficulty while operating it, please get back to us with an error screenshot so that we can check the same and assist you better.   ​   Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!  

I am sorry to know that you are unable to operate the PharmEasy application. We aim to provide the best service, however, situations like these are rare. 

Please be informed that at times, due to network issues, you may face such technical issues. As a quick fix, I request you to clear your browsing cookies, cache and reinstall your PharmEasy application and connect to a stable network. If you face any difficulty while operating it, please get back to us with an error screenshot so that we can check the same and assist you better. 
​
Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal
